name: Premature Optimization Anti-Pattern
description: Optimizing code before understanding actual performance bottlenecks
when_to_use:
Optimizing without profiling
Complex solutions for unproven problems
Sacrificing readability for theoretical gains
drawbacks:
Increased complexity
Reduced readability
Harder maintenance
May not address real bottlenecks
use_cases:
Complex caching without evidence of need
Micro-optimizations in non-critical paths
Architecture decisions based on assumptions
